name: In The Well
description:
You wake up in an icy land surrounded by a vast and endless ocean, you don't know who you are and why you are here...
Seeking to know the truth, and escape a dark evil that lurks behind you, you will have to move forward to the truth that you are desperately trying to find.
Are you condemned to stay in this icy prison for ever?

Or will you give in to the temptation to see what is hiding in the depths of the well?
Explore the ice lands, avoid the traps that are set for you!

Run and never look back, learn the history of your own past, and break the chains of your imprisonment.

Choose your path and push back the shadow that threatens you once and for all.
In the well...

Features:

  • Rpg 2D
  • Duration of the game (1h-2h)
  • Basic retro graphic style
  • Save not allowed
  • Multiple choices
  • riddles to solve
  • Unique and fascinating story
